summary: AN ORDINANCE approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6426 for the improvement of the NORTH-SOUTH ALLEY in BLOCK 4, CRAVEN'S DIVISION OF GREEN LAKE ADDITION, being the north-south alley between Linden Avenue North and Aurora Avenue North from North 67th Street to North 68th Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same.
